Thanks kanade_alter for clearing that up. Its does make sense, the numbering for this story is so messed up
So yeah, there's no missing chapter. There's one untranslated one (https://nhentai.net/g/256460/174/) but it doesn't contribute anything to the story progression.

Ok here's the reading order for those asking :
Chapter 0 to 4 : https://nhentai.net/g/294399/
Chapter 1.5 : https://nhentai.net/g/193905/
Chapter 4.5 : https://nhentai.net/g/200958/
Chapter 5 : https://nhentai.net/g/228018/
Chapter 5.5 (ExE 14) : https://nhentai.net/g/295464/
Chapter 6 (ExE 9) : https://nhentai.net/g/228019/
Chapter 7-8.5 (ExE 11-13)  : https://nhentai.net/g/243948/
After this is my guess since DISTANCE didn't bother to write the chapter number "
Chapter 9-10 (ExE 15-19): https://nhentai.net/g/306758/
Chapter 11 (ExE 20) : https://nhentai.net/g/326639/
Then goes back to numbering the chapter :
Chapter 12 (ExE 24) : this
Chapter 13 (ExE 25) : https://nhentai.net/g/324437/

There you have it. Hope it helps and clear some confusion.
